title: 162-A
statement: A. Pentagonal numberstime limit per test3 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutPentagonal numbers are figurate numbers which can be calculated using the formulapn= (3n2-n) / 2(always integer). You are givenn; calculaten-th pentagonal number.InputThe only line of input contains an integern(1 ≤n≤ 100).OutputOutput then-th pentagonal number.ExamplesInput2Output5Input5Output35
